what_you_do: Jase Souder runs the World Class Speaker Academy, providing speaker training and coaching to help entrepreneurs become world-class speakers who generate clients and impact through their presentations.
who_you_serve: Entrepreneurs, business owners, brand-new speakers, seasoned professionals, and anyone with a mission they want to fund and fulfill through their business.
social_proof: Nationally recognized public speaker, best-selling author, 20+ years of speaking experience, has coached thousands including A-list celebrities and movie stars.
signature_programs: World Class Speaker Academy, Black Belt Speaker, Profitable Presentation Training, Sell From Stage Group
business_focus: Training entrepreneurs and professionals to become world-class speakers who generate clients and income through powerful presentations.
service_provided: Speaker training, presentation coaching, membership site, live events, personal coaching, online courses
